name: The Junior Developer: The Number One Rule Of Programming Is Leave Emotion At The Door
caption: thejuniordeveloper.blogspot.com
description: I find this interesting. As a junior developer, I am by no means attached to my code. In fact, I'm begging for someone to teach me to do it right, but for some reason all I end up receiving is a bunch of senior devs that enjoy grilling the crap out of me and I absolutely hate it. I am seriously rethâ€¦
